name: Origanum
Relationship: Compare: FERULA GLAUCA (in violent sexual excitement in women; icy coldness in occiput); PLAT.; VALER.; CANTH.; HYOS.

Female: EROTOMANIA; powerful lascivious impulses; leucorrhoea; hysteria

details: Acts on nervous system generally, and is effective in masturbation and excessively aroused sexual impulses. Affections of the breasts. (BUFO.) Desire for active exercise IMPELLING HER TO RUN.
